message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take a bigger share, but still leaving some for you!

I'll take a bigger share, but I'll give you a tiny bit to keep you from getting too upset... again!

I'll take the last bit, but I'll give you a tiny bit to keep you from getting too upset... again... again... again!
